item.description:
Jamaica Plain has a bunch of fun casual places to meet up & wind down on a Friday evening. We're starting with our first "JP Pub Crawl" event this month, with more to follow in September, October and beyond.

The Alchemist Lounge is a new addition to the JP pub/restaurant/nightlife circuit. Great food - very tasty, ample portions and very reasonably priced. Very mellow Lounge atmosphere in the pub/bar section [and big screen TV for Red Sox games], with separate formal dining area available too. Live music over weekends too, later on in the evening (after the RedSox finish playing!).

Alchemist Lounge

Driving Directions:
Goto the Alchemist Lounge web-site.
Click on "Hours & Directions" to get map & directions from CitySearch.
There is limited parking on the street; public parking lots available nearby on Center Street (Spring Park Ave) and by the Hi-Lo Foods Minimarket on Hyde Square.

Public Transport:
Take the Green Line E Branch to the end (Heath Street). Transfer to a #39 bus which will
take you south on S. Huntington Ave, right by the Lounge.

PLEASE RSVP TO LET US KNOW IF YOU ARE COMING SO THAT WE CAN BOOK A TABLE &/OR ELBOW-ROOM AT THE BAR!!!
item.name: JP Pub Crawl #1
